data.title: Manex Sp. z o.o. Â» MANEX obtained the Certificate of the Railway Institute in Warsaw for halogen
data.text:
Due to changing requirements regarding rolling stock cables MANEX started preparations to implement new technologies.

As a result of research and development works MANEX achieved in 2010 a product whch was tested by the Laboratory for Testing of Materials and Construction Elements of the Railway Institute. The positive mark of tests resulted in granting to MANEX in 2011 the Certificate issued by the Railway Institute in Warsaw for compliance with PN-K 02511:2000 standard for two types of cables: MXC 1000HF and MXR 1000HF.
